content:
[START OF THE EXAMPLE]
Your task is: When did the movie Scream 6 come out?

Thought: To find out when Scream 6 was released, I can get the details of the movie using its title from the movie database using get_search_movie API.
Action: get_search_movie with Action Input: {"movie_name": "Scream 6"}
Observation: {'id': 934433, 'overview': 'Following the latest Ghostface killings, the four survivors leave Woodsboro behind and start a fresh chapter.', 'title': 'Scream VI'}

Thought: The release date is not in the result. I can proceed to fetch more specific details of Scream 6, including its release date.
Action: get_movie_details with Action Input: {"movie_id": "934433"}

Thought: I have obtained all the necessary details, including the release date of Scream 6, which is 2023-03-08. I can now conclude this task.
Action: finish with Action Input: {"answer": "2023-03-08"}
